Simplemente por ser el hermano del shogun, Lord Naritsugu est\u00e1 por encima de la ley, y asesina y viola a su antojo. Afligido por la masacre perpetrada por el s\u00e1dico Naritsugu, el oficial Sir Doi contacta secretamente con el samur\u00e1i Shinzaemon Shimada para acabar con Naritsugu. El noble samur\u00e1i, indignado por la crueldad de Naritsugu, acepta de buen grado la peligrosa misi\u00f3n. Para ello, re\u00fane a un selecto grupo de samur\u00e1is, entre los que se encuentra su sobrino Shinrokuro y el devoto aprendiz Hirayama. Juntos, traman una emboscada para atrapar a Lord Naritsugu. Shinzaemon es consciente del peligro que conlleva. Naritsugu va escoltado por una comitiva encabezada por el letal e implacable Hanbei, uno de sus antiguos rivales. Los \u201c13 asesinos\u201d de Takashi Miike es un remake del film hom\u00f3nimo dirigido por Eichi Kudo en 1963.","cast":[{"name":"K\u00f4ji Yakusho","role":"Shinzaemon Shimada","images":null,"id":47099},{"name":"Takayuki Yamada","role":"Shinrokuro Shimada","images":null,"id":56158},{"name":"Y\u00fbsuke Iseya","role":"Koyata Kiga","images":{"face":"\/1b\/6a\/1b6aee344d0592860a74cb447f09f79d.jpg"},"id":30018},{"name":"Ikki Sawamura","role":"Gunjiro Mitsuhashi","images":null,"id":210414},{"name":"Arata Furuta","role":"Heizo Sahara","images":null,"id":210416},{"name":"S\u00f4suke Takaoka","role":"Yasokichi Hioki","images":null,"id":78249},{"name":"Seiji Rokkaku","role":"Mosuke Otake","images":null},{"name":"Kazuki Namioka","role":"Rihei Ishizuka","images":null},{"name":"K\u00f4en Kond\u00f4","role":"Yahachi Horii","images":null},{"name":"Y\u00fbma Ishigaki","role":"Gannai Higuchi","images":null}],"composer":{"name":"K\u00f4ji End\u00f4","images":null},"genres":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"distributor":"Avalon Distribuci\u00f3n Audiovisual","numInteractions":18248,"numRatings":2933,"ratingHistogram":{"1":37,"2":85,"3":497,"4":1361,"5":953},"seasonsBlocked":[],"producers":[{"name":"Sedic International","images":null},{"name":"Recorded Picture Company (RPC)","images":null},{"name":"Asahi Broadcasting Corporation (ABC)","images":null}],"writers":[{"name":"Kaneo Ikegami","images":null},{"name":"Daisuke Tengan","images":null,"id":61928}],"countries":["JP","GB"],"directors":[{"name":"Takashi Miike","images":{"face":"\/b4\/e0\/b4e07ba3681891592beca8511554e660.jpg"},"id":17590}],"availability":{"inTheaters":false,"vodSummary":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"vod":[],"schedule":[],"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"status":3,"statusMedia":"pending"}
